body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   News               Photos & Multimedia               History & Culture               Nature               Education               Kids & Youth               Management               Bookstore             Follow the links below or images above to find out what makes Gila Cliff Dwellings such a special place.      News Stay connected to Gila Cliff Dwellings National Monument through our news releases, and of course our Facebook page.      Photos & Multimedia Explore the many breathtaking views and historic photos of Gila Cliff Dwellings.      History & Culture Discover how Gila Cliff Dwellings is a tapestry of stories that make it unique.      Nature Come explore the natural beauty of Gila Cliff Dwellings National Monument.      Education A field trip to Gila Cliff Dwellings National Monument and first-hand explorations of its resources gives students a wonderful opportunity to form their own intellectual and emotional connections to our shared cultural heritage.      Kids & Youth Children ages seven to twelve can become a Junior Ranger at Gila Cliff Dwellings National Monument by completing at least four specific activities while visiting the park in our Junior Ranger Program Booklet - "Welcome To Our Home in the Gila" (PDF 5.26 MB). The Senior Ranger Program Booklet - "Discover Cliff Dweller Canyon" (PDF 9.66 MB) is available for those over twelve years of age. Please Remember:You must visit the park in order to earn your Junior Ranger Badge.       Management      Bookstore The bookstore offers books and other materials to enhance the experience of visitors to the Gila Cliff Dwellings and the Gila Wilderness.
